title: Infinite timeout loop in LightPeerChain
body:
### What is wrong?

Looks like we fail to drop peers after too many consecutive timeouts and then enter in an infinite loop:

```
    INFO  06-26 15:57:14  lightchain  synced headers up to #1905301
    INFO  06-26 15:57:17  lightchain  Timeout when fetching headers from LESPeer <Node(0x053d@79.98.29.154)> (attempt 1 of 5)

    INFO  06-26 15:57:31  lightchain  Timeout when fetching headers from LESPeer <Node(0x053d@79.98.29.154)> (attempt 5 of 5)
 WARNING  06-26 15:57:31  lightchain  TooManyTimeouts()
    INFO  06-26 15:57:31     service  LESPeer <Node(0x053d@79.98.29.154)> finished: Cancellation requested by LESPeer token
```

### How can it be fixed

Need to investigate
